subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets have come to expect almost anything from Bartolo Colon, which may be why they are leaning toward using him as a reliever in the postseason, a role he has never regularly held.
snippet: The Mets have come to expect almost anything from Bartolo Colon, which may be why they are leaning toward using him as a reliever in the postseason, a role he has never regularly held.
